// The unit test is generated by sakura-node-ts (https://github.com/DaYeSquad/sakura-node-ts)

import * as supertest from "supertest";
import * as chai from "chai";

describe("Test Monitor API", () => {

  it("注册监控请求", (done: MochaDone) => {
    const request: any = {
      "projectId": 1882
    };

    supertest("https://api.gagogroup.cn/api")
      .put("/monitor_config")
      .set("Token", "test-token")
      .send(JSON.stringify(request))
      .expect((res: supertest.Response)=> {
        chai.expect(res.body["data"]["message"]).to.equal("ok");
      })
      .expect(200, done);
  });

});
